sentence: Georgians are ready for a bold conservative who will fight the political establishment, instead of caving to radical liberals like Brian Kemp has done every step of the way.? The primary race, which takes place May 24, has drawn national attention, largely because of Trump, who has been outspoken in his support for Perdue and disapproval of Kemp over Georgia's 2020 election process.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Trump to Rally in Georgia this Month for David Perdue's Campaign Against Kemp
